tool_description: Create a PNG image of a vertical bar chart.
name: Create PNG Charts
title: Create PNG Charts

api_list.name: Create Vertical Bar Chart
api_list.description:
Creates a Vertical Bar Chart in PNG image format.
Colors are solid for the overall background and vertical bars. (no gradient)
Values that you give to api are zero or higher.
Each value (int/float) is one bar in png chart.
I tested it with 12 vertical bars, anything more and it looks kinda squished.
API returns an array, one item in array is base 64 encoded string of png image.
You need to base 64 decode and save it to file.
The png created is not saved/hosted.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://create-png-charts.p.rapidapi.com/ep1-api/create_vertical_bar_chart/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "create-png-charts.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://create-png-charts.p.rapidapi.com/ep1-api/create_vertical_bar_chart/"

headers = {
